name: LearnFrench
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn french
Developer Terms of Use
des:
How to learn French in seconds. Learn new French words and phrases every day thanks to alexa. Listen to the word French and the corresponding example sentence. Then alexa will repeat everything in English so you can memorise the meaning of the word.
Part of the competence content is in French .

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
